subject: ORDER #SSN2666
description_text:
Hello,

Today i received a beautiful set of pedals which im very happy with.
But it didn’t contain the haptic motors.
Is it possible to send them to me?
 Thank you so much

Greets,

Erik

conversations.body_text: Hi Erik van Empelen,    I noticed your package was destroyed instead of being redelivered. We will resend it for you. However, you will need to cover part of the loss, approximately $39. Would you be willing to accept this arrangement? Thank you for your understanding.

Hello,
Im ok with paying $39,- for the loss.



Op 20 okt 2025 om 12:50 heeft service@simsonn.com het volgende geschreven:

﻿
Hi Erik van Empelen,

I noticed your package was destroyed instead of being redelivered. We will resend it for you. However, you will need to cover part of the loss, approximately $39. Would you be willing to accept this arrangement? Thank you for your understanding.
Hi Erik van Empelen,    Thank you for your understanding. We shall resend it to you as soon as possible. Please complete payment via the link.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-2

Hello, payment has been done.

Greetzz


Op 21 okt 2025 om 12:57 heeft service@simsonn.com het volgende geschreven:

﻿
Hi Erik van Empelen,

<https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-2>
